src_text: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.
ref_text: Riba djaluna, Sara Danius, sekretario permanente di e Komitiva Nobel pa Literatura na e Akademia Sueko, a anunsiá públikamente durante un programa radial na Sveriges Radio na Suesia ku e komitiva sin por a haña kontakto ku Bob Dylan direktamente tokante ganamentu di e Premio Nobel pa Literatura 2016, a stòp ku su intentonan pa haña kontakto kuné.
hyp_text: Di lunes, Sara Danius, secretario permanente di Comité Nobel pa Literatura na Academia Sueco, anunsia públicamente durante un programa di radio na Sveriges Radio na Suecia, cu e comité a desisti di intenta kontakta Bob Dylan directamente despues di e Nobel Prize di Literatura 2016, y a no a bisa alcanza el.

src_text: The Three Kingdoms was one of the bloodiest eras in Ancient China’s history thousands of people died fighting to sit in the highest seat in the grand palace at Xi’an.
